user

Summary
Users define the people that can log in to a particular tenant. Most users are configured as Other and then given project specific roles. A few users may be configured as Admin users so that they can create new projects.


Fields Type Attributes Description
active  boolean required
  		Indicates if this user is allowed to log in. New users are active by default, but can be de-activated to easily restrict access to the entire system.  
createdLocalDate  date abstract
  		The created date based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTime  time abstract
  		The created time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.  
createdLocalTsMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The created timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
createdUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was originally created.  
dashboardLineCount1  integer required
  		The number of panels to display on the first line, 0-3.  
dashboardLineCount2  integer required
  		The number of panels to display on the second line, 0-3.  
dashboardOrientationTypeCode  longEnumCode
max length: 30
allows letters
allows digits
allows symbols 		required
  		Indicates whether the dashboard should be organized for portrait or landscape. The 'Auto' mode will attempt to update the layout automatically depending on the orientation of your screen.

max length: 30
allows letters

allows symbols 		required
  		The panel to display in position A.

allows letters

displayString  abstractText
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		A human readable semi-unique value used to identify each model. This typically uses something like the model's name or code which is expected to be unique enough to distinish between the different values within a particular project.  
email  email
max length: 50
allows printable 		required
  		Used both to sign in, and to send emails to this user.  
firstName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		  The user's first name; e.g.: John, Jane. This may be blank.  
formalName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The first and last name together; e.g.: Smith, John. Use the nickname if the first and last names are both empty. This should never be blank.  
fullName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The first and last name together; e.g.: John Smith. Use the nickname if the first and last names are both empty. This should never be blank.  
lastName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		  The user's last name; e.g.: Smith, Jones. This may be blank.  
lockVersion  lockVersion audit disabled   This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.  
longName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		Return the first name, last name, and nick name, formatted for display on screen. This should never be blank.  
nickname  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		  The user's short nickname, for informal use. This may be blank.  
passwordHash  shaHash
max length: 40
allows printable 		  The password sha hash used to authenticate the user. The actual password is not stored. If the user has no password the hash is set to empty string.  
passwordSalt  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		required
  		The salt used for this user. Each user has a different salt. The salt is set to a random value when the user is created. Once set the salt should never be changed, changing it will invalidate the password.  
phone  phone
max length: 30
allows printable 		  The number that may be used to contact this user.  
roleCode  longEnumCode
max length: 30
allows letters
allows digits
allows symbols 		required
enum
  		The user's global access role.

Developer, has full access to all data and functions in the app.

Admin, has access to admin functions e.g. adding/editing users and projects.

Other, any other user.  
roleName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		abstract
  		The user's global access role.

Developer, has full access to all data and functions in the app.

Admin, has access to admin functions e.g. adding/editing users and projects.

Other, any other user.  
shortName  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		Return a single name, preferably the nickname or first name. This should never be blank.  
timeZoneCode  timeZoneCode
max length: 40
allows printable 		required
  		The user's preferred time zone.  
uid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		primary key
required
  		The global unique key. This is a large hex-encoded number, and is usually not displayed to users. This is currently NOT a standard format, but is instead a format that we use internally.  
updatedLocalDate  date abstract
  		The updated date based on the user's local timezone.

  		The updated time of day based on the user's local timezone.  
updatedLocalTs  timestamp abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone.

max length: 100
allows printable 		abstract
  		The updated timestamp converted to the user's local timezone, and formatted as a string that includes the timezone code.  
updatedUtcTs  timestamp required
audit disabled   		The time this record was last updated.
